parameters.name: ToplevelOnly
parameters.description: True to get only the number of components at the top level of the FeatureManager design tree, false to get the number of top level and all child components in the FeatureManager design tree

title: IAssemblyDoc.GetComponentCount
description: Gets the number of components in the active configuration of this assembly.

parameters.name: ToplevelOnly
parameters.description: True to get only the number of components at the top level of the FeatureManager design tree, false to get the number of top level and all child components in the FeatureManager design tree

remarks:
Use this method before using
IAssemblyDoc::IGetComponents
to determine the size of the array to pass into that method.
